result.title: Topic of the problem should not be visible to solvers when they open a problem
result.content: Hi codeforces, I want to know the reason why in the right side we have a tag section claiming whether its a dp problem or tree or graph problem.That solves the whole fun of solving the problem.All these things should be in editorial of problem not visible when oyu freshly open a problem.What is CF communities points on this issue?
